com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth

类 AylaIDPAuthProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.auth.AylaIDPAuthProvider

  • public class AylaIDPAuthProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides partner cloud authentication through Ayla as IDP. This class will host partner authorization objects per parter Id for all partner clouds that app is configured to use.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  AylaIDPAuthProvider.IDPPartnerToken
      Object stand for partner token.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AylaIDPAuthProvider(AylaSessionManager sessionManager)
      Initializes partner auth provider.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      AylaAPIRequest getPartnerTokensForPartnerIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> partnerIds, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<java.util.List<AylaIDPAuthProvider.IDPPartnerToken>> successListener, ErrorListener errorListener)
      Retrieves short-lived partnerTokens from Ayla IDP service for given partnerIds.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AylaIDPAuthProvider

        public AylaIDPAuthProvider(AylaSessionManager sessionManager)
        Initializes partner auth provider.
        参数:
        sessionManager - AylaSessionManager after user has successully signed into the App

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPartnerTokensForPartnerIds

        public AylaAPIRequest getPartnerTokensForPartnerIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> partnerIds,
                                                    com.android.volley.Response.Listener<java.util.List<AylaIDPAuthProvider.IDPPartnerToken>> successListener,
                                                    ErrorListener errorListener)
        Retrieves short-lived partnerTokens from Ayla IDP service for given partnerIds. These partner tokens are used to login to partner cloud.
        参数:
        partnerIds - Array of partner Ids. If no specific partner Ids, all available partner token will be returned.
        successListener - Listener executed after successfully fetching partner tokens
        errorListener - Listener executed in case of an error.
